column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////When I asked about the kugelhopf
column2: the lady behind the counter said it's Austrian - but upon googling
column5: meaning that it originated from the Germanic part of France
column6: the Alsace region. The Austrians spell it differently. What does the Kugelhopf taste like? Very similar to the Italian panettone but with only spiked white raisins and no candied citrus peels.
